name: Blue Cash Preferred® Card
bonus: Earn $250 back after you spend $1,000 in purchases on your new Card in your first 3 months. You will receive the $250 back in the form of a statement credit.†

name: The Platinum Card®

name: Bank of America® Cash Rewards
bonus: $200 online cash rewards bonus offer and 3% cash back in the category of your choice
introApr: Introductory 0%† APR for your first 15 billing cycles for purchases. After the intro APR offer ends, a Variable APR that's currently 13.99% to 23.99% will apply.
benefits: 3% cash back in the category of your choice. Your choice categories include: gas, online shopping, dining, travel, drug stores, or home improvement/furnishings
2% cash back at grocery stores and wholesale clubs
Unlimited 1% cash back on all other purchases

Preferred Rewards members earn 25%-75% more cash back on every purchase. That means the 3% choice category could go up to 5.25% and the 2% at grocery stores and wholesale clubs could go up to 3.5%, for the first $2,500 in combined choice category/grocery store/wholesale club purchases each quarter, and the 1% for all other purchases could go up to 1.75%.

name: Bank of America® Premium Rewards®
benefits: Earn unlimited points, that don't expire – 2 points for every $1 spent on travel and dining purchases
1.5 points per $1 on all other purchases

Preferred Rewards members earn 25%-75% more points on every purchase. That means you could earn up to 3.5 points for every $1 you spend on travel and dining purchases and up to 2.62 points for every $1 you spend on all other purchases.

Redeem for cash back as a deposit into Bank of America® checking or savings accounts, for credit to eligible Merrill accounts including 529 accounts, as a statement credit to your credit card, or for gift cards and purchases at the Bank of America Travel Center

Get up to $200 in combined Airline Incidental and TSA Pre✓®/Global Entry Statement Credits. Plus, access to world class travel perks: travel and purchase protections, luxury hotel collection and concierge service.

benefits: The only card that automatically rounds up to the nearest 10 points on every purchase

name: Citi® Double Cash Card
introApr: Balance transfer offer: 0% intro APR on balance transfer for 18 months; after that the variable APR will be 13.99% - 23.99% based on your creditworthiness.*
benefits: Earn cash back rewards on every purchase with the Citi® Double Cash card. You get unlimited 1% cash back when you buy, plus another 1% back as you pay for those purchases. Make your money go further with one of Citi's best cash back credit cards.
Unlike many other cash back credit cards, Citi Double Cash has no restricting categories to keep track of or enroll in.2 There are also no caps on the total amount of cash back you earn.

name: Citi Premier Card
bonus: Earn 60,000 Bonus Points after making $4,000 in purchases with your card within the first 3 months of account opening.*
benefits: Earn 3 points per $1 spent on travel including gas stations, as well as airfare, hotels, car rental agencies, public transportation, tolls, parking and much more
Earn 2 points per $1 spent dining at restaurants and on entertainment, from lunch at a cafe to bars and lounges, as well as sporting events, movie theaters, concerts and more.
Earn 1 point per $1 spent on all other purchases, from retailers and drug stores to monthly memberships and bills.
